plugin.name: Wallet Store
plugin.description: Enables searching for Intra Users and conecting one to the other

plugin.name: Crypto Addresses
plugin.description: Enables the underground exchange of crypto addresses

plugin.name: Intra Actor
plugin.description: Enables searching for Intra Users and conecting one to the other

addon.name: File System
addon.description: Is the interface between the OS specific File System and the platform components that need to consume file system services

addon.name: Database System
addon.description: Is a wrapper designed to isolate the rest of the components from the OS dependent Database System

addon.name: Database System

step.title: Asset Issuer - Reference Wallet
step.description: Represents UI Android for job with wallet
step.name: Asset Issuer

step.title: Asset Factory
step.description: Represents UI Android for creation the Asset
step.name: Asset Factory

step.title: Asset Issuer - Wallet Module
step.superlayer: Connection layer and the representation of the business layer
step.name: Asset Issuer

step.title: Asset Factory
step.superlayer: Connection layer and the representation of the business layer
step.name: Asset Factory

step.title: Asset Issuer - Actor
step.superlayer: Connection layer and the representation of the business layer
step.name: Asset Issuer

step.title: Asset Factory
step.superlayer: Interlayer for the implementation of the Asset Factory
step.name: Asset Factory

process.name: Install a Crypto Broker Reference Wallet
process.description: Install a Crypto Broker Wallet from the Wallet Store

step.title: Broker select the Reference Wallet from the Wallet Store
step.description: The Crypto Broker enter in the Wallet Store en select the Crypto Broker Reference Wallet to install it.
step.name: Wallet Store

step.title: Invoke the installation of the Reference Wallet to the Wallet Manager
step.description: Invoke the installation of the Reference Wallet to the Wallet Manager Middleware Plugin
step.name: Wallet Store

step.title: Reference Wallet's Resources Installation Request Request
step.description: The Wallet Manager send a Request to install the resources of the Reference Wallet
step.name: Wallet Manager

step.title: Download of resources in the device
step.description: The Wallet Resources Network Service download from the GitHub repository the necessary resources for the Crypto Broker Reference Wallet
step.name: Wallet Resources

step.title: Take of the Navigation Structure and Activation of the Reference Wallet
step.description: Take the Navigation Structure of the Reference Wallet and fire a event registering the activation of the Reference Wallet
step.name: Wallet Runtime

step.title: Marking the Reference Wallet has Installed
step.description: Mark the Crypto Broker Reference Wallet as Installed and fire a event
step.name: Wallet Manager

step.title: Request of resources for the Sub Apps
step.description: Request to the SubApp Resources Network Service the download of the resources for the Crypto Broker Identity and Crypto Customer Community Sub Apps
step.name: Sub App Manager

step.title: Download of resources for the Sub Apps
step.description: Download the resources for the Crypto Broker Identity and Crypto Customer Community Sub Apps
step.name: Sub App Resources

step.title: Take of the Navigation Structure and Activation of the Sub Apps
step.description: Take of the Navigation Structure of the Crypto Broker Identity and Crypto Customer Community Sub Apps and fire a event activate them
step.name: Sub App Runtime

step.title: Marking the Sub Apps has Installed
step.description: Mark the Sub Apps as Installed
step.name: Sub App Manager

process.name: Install a Crypto Customer Reference Wallet
process.description: Install a Crypto Broker Wallet from the Wallet Store

step.title: Customer select the Reference Wallet from the Wallet Store
step.description: The Customer enter in the Wallet Store en select the Crypto Customer Reference Wallet to install it.
step.name: Wallet Store

step.title: Invoke the installation of the Reference Wallet to the Wallet Manager
step.description: Invoke the installation of the Reference Wallet to the Wallet Manager Middleware Plugin
step.name: Wallet Store

step.title: Reference Wallet's Resources Installation Request Request
step.description: The Wallet Manager send a Request to install the resources of the Reference Wallet
step.name: Wallet Manager

step.title: Download of resources in the device
step.description: The Wallet Resources Network Service download from the GitHub repository the necessary resources for the Crypto Customer Reference Wallet
step.name: Wallet Resources

step.title: Take of the Navigation Structure and Activation of the Reference Wallet
step.description: Take the Navigation Structure of the Reference Wallet and fire a event registering the activation of the Reference Wallet
step.name: Wallet Runtime

step.title: Marking the Reference Wallet has Installed
step.description: Mark the Crypto Customer Reference Wallet as Installed and fire a event
step.name: Wallet Manager

step.title: Request of resources for the Sub Apps
step.description: Request to the SubApp Resources Network Service the download of the resources for the Crypto Customer Identity and Crypto Broker Community Sub Apps
step.name: Sub App Manager

step.title: Download of resources for the Sub Apps
step.description: Download the resources for the Crypto Customer Identity and Crypto Broker Community Sub Apps
step.name: Sub App Resources

step.title: Take of the Navigation Structure and Activation of the Sub Apps
step.description: Take of the Navigation Structure of the Crypto Customer Identity and Crypto Broker Community Sub Apps and fire a event activate them
step.name: Sub App Runtime

step.title: Marking the Sub Apps has Installed
step.description: Mark the Sub Apps as Installed
step.name: Sub App Manager

process.name: Associate a Broker Identity with a Reference Wallet
process.description: A Broker associate one of his Identities to a Crypto Broker Reference Wallet

step.title: Select a Crypto Broker Reference Wallet and request the list of Identities
step.description: The Broker select a Crypto Broker Reference Wallet from the Desktop of the Fermat app to associate and request the list of Identities
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Request the list of Identities
step.description: Receive the request from the Reference Wallet to obtain the list of Identities. This send the request to the Crypto Broker Identity Plugin
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Return the list of Identities
step.description: Return the list of Identities
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Return the list of Identities
step.description: Return the list of Identities
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Show the list of Identities and the broker selected the identity to associate
step.description: Show the list of Broker Identities. The broker select one identity and the reference wallet request the module to associate the selected identity
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Request the Wallet - Identity association to the Crypto Broker Actor Plugin
step.description: Receive the request from the Reference wallet and Request the Wallet - Identity association to the Crypto Broker Actor Plugin
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Register Wallet - Identity association
step.description: Register Wallet - Identity association in its Data Base
step.name: Crypto Broker

process.name: Associate a Customer Identity with a Reference Wallet
process.description: A Customer associate one of his Identities to a Crypto Customer Reference Wallet

step.title: Select a Crypto Customer Reference Wallet and request the list of Identities
step.description: The Customer select a Crypto Customer Reference Wallet from the Desktop of the Fermat app to associate and request the list of Identities
step.name: Crypto Customer

step.title: Request the list of Identities
step.description: Receive the request from the Reference Wallet to obtain the list of Identities. This send the request to the Crypto Customer Identity Plugin
step.name: Crypto Customer

step.title: Return the list of Identities
step.description: Return the list of Identities
step.name: Crypto Customer

step.title: Return the list of Identities
step.description: Return the list of Identities
step.name: Crypto Customer

step.title: Show the list of Identities and the Customer select the identity to associate
step.description: Show the list of Customer Identities. The Customer select one identity and the reference wallet request the module to associate the selected identity
step.name: Crypto Customer

step.title: Request the Wallet - Identity association to the Crypto Customer Actor Plugin
step.description: Receive the request from the Reference wallet and Request the Wallet - Identity association to the Crypto Customer Actor Plugin
step.name: Crypto Customer

step.title: Register Wallet - Identity association
step.description: Register Wallet - Identity association in its Data Base
step.name: Crypto Customer

process.name: Crypto Broker Publish his Identity
process.description: Broker Publish his Identity to make it visible in the Fermat Network

step.title: Broker Select one Identity and select 'Publish'
step.description: The Broker Select one Identity and select 'Publish' in the UI. The Reference Wallet request the module to change the state of this identity to Public
step.name: Crypto Broker Identity

step.title: Request the actor to publish the identity
step.description: Request the actor to publish the identity
step.name: Crypto Broker Identity

step.title: Change the status of the Identity to Public
step.description: Change the status of the Identity to Public
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Modify in its Data Base the Status of the Identity
step.description: Modify in its Data Base the Status of the Identity
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Send the Identity Information to the Actor Network Service
step.description: Send the Identity Information to the Actor Network Service
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Consult the details of the identity to publish
step.description: Consult the details of the identity to publish and send it to the Fermat Network
step.name: Crypto Broker

process.name: Connection request from customer to broker
process.description: A customer sends a connection request to crypto broker in order to be able to see his products and start a negotiation.

step.title: Select broker and submit request
step.description: The customer selects a broker from the list and submits the request to connect to him.
step.name: Crypto Broker Community

step.title: Route request to network service
step.description: The module routes this request to the network service to reach the selected broker.
step.name: Crypto Broker Community

step.title: Call the broker to deliver the request
step.description: The network service places a call to the broker and then it delivers the request via the Fermat network.
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Transport request
step.description: The request is transported through the communication layer and one of the available channels.
step.name: Communication Layer

step.title: Receive the request
step.description: The network service receives the request and informs the Crypto Broker Actor.
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Records the request
step.description: The request is saved and a notification for the end user is created.
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Records the notification
step.description: The the notification is saved and the OS core library is notified.
step.name: Notification

step.title: Send notification to the OS
step.description: Sends the notification to the OS and this in turn shows it to the end user.
step.name: Notification Manager

process.name: Broker Accept a Connection from a Customer
process.description: A Crypto Broker accept a connection request send by a Crypto Customer

step.title: Request list of Crypto Customers waiting for connection
step.description: The Broker request the list of Crypto Customers waiting to connect with him
step.name: Crypto Customer Community

step.title: Request list of Crypto Customers waiting for connection
step.description: The module routes this request to the Actor to get the list
step.name: Crypto Customer Community

step.title: Return of Crypto Customers waiting for connection
step.description: Consult its Data Base to get the Crypto Customers waiting for connection and return it has a list.
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Return the list of Crypto Customers waiting for connection
step.description: The module return to the Sub App the list of Crypto Customers waiting for connection
step.name: Crypto Customer Community

step.title: Show the list of Crypto Customers waiting for connection and Broker accept one of them
step.description: Show the list of Crypto Customers waiting for connection returned by the module. The Broker accept one of this request
step.name: Crypto Customer Community

step.title: Register that the connection has been accepted
step.description: The module routes this request to the Actor to register this update
step.name: Crypto Customer Community

step.title: Return of Crypto Customers waiting for connection
step.description: Register in its Data Base to get the state of the connection change to Accepted. Tell the Network Service to notify the Crypto Customer that the Broker has accepted the connection
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Send the message of the update to the Crypto Customer
step.description: Send to the Crypto Customer device that the connection request has been accepted
step.name: Crypto Customer

step.title: Receive the message send by the Crypto Broker
step.description: Receive the message send by the Crypto telling him that the connection request has been accepted. Send a event to the plugins notifying about this
step.name: Crypto Customer

step.title: Send notification to the OS
step.description: Sends the notification to the OS and this in turn shows it to the end user.
step.name: Notification Manager

step.description: If the data del Sale Negotiation are more updated than the negotiation Purchase keeps if not update

process.name: Close Negotiation Customer Broker
process.description: The Crypto Customer update negotiation with Crypto Broker.

step.title: Start Customer Broker Close Negotiation Transaction
step.description: The Crypto Customer Acept all clause and it Close negotiations with the selected Crypto Broker
step.name: Crypto Customer

step.title: Process Negotiation Request
step.description: Processes the request to Close negotiation
step.name: Crypto Customer

step.title: Manages the Close of Negotiation
step.description: Create a transaction to manage the Close negotiation Customer Broker, If the merchandise is currency Crypto, requesting Crypto address actuality the Customer
step.name: Customer Broker Close

step.title: Close The Purchase Negotiation
step.description: If the merchandise is currency Crypto, add to information of Purchase Negotiation the Crypto address actuality the Customer and later Close the Purchase Negotiation
step.name: Customer Broker Purchaser

step.title: Process Sending Close Negotiation To Broker
step.description: Process Sending Close Negotiation To Broker
step.name: Customer Broker Close

step.title: Sending Close Negotiation To Broker
step.description: Sending Close negotiation to Broker for Close Sale Negotiation
step.name: Negotiation Transmission

step.title: Receiving Close Negotiation From Customer
step.description: Receiving Close negotiation from Customer for Close Sale Negotiation
step.name: Negotiation Transmission

step.title: Process Receiving Close Negotiation From Customer
step.description: Process Receiving Close Negotiation From Customer. If the payment is currency Crypto, requesting Crypto address actuality the Broker
step.name: Customer Broker Close

step.title: Close The Sale Negotiation
step.description: If the payment is currency Crypto, add to information of Sale Negotiation the Crypto address actuality the Broker and later Close the Sale Negotiation
step.name: Customer Broker Sale

step.title: Sending Confirmation of Close Negotiation
step.description: Sending Confirmation of Close Negotiation to Customer
step.name: Negotiation Transmission

step.title: Receiving Confirmation of Close Negotiation
step.description: Receiving Confirmation of Close Negotiation From Broker
step.name: Negotiation Transmission

step.title: Process the Receive Confirmation of Close Negotiation
step.description: Process the Receive Confirmation of Close Negotiation
step.name: Customer Broker Close

step.title: Confirm the Close Negotiation is Done
step.name: Customer Broker Purchase

process.name: Close Negotiation Broker Customer
process.description: The Crypto Broker update negotiation with Crypto Customer.

step.title: Process Negotiation Request
step.description: Processes the request to Close negotiation

step.title: Manages the Close of Negotiation

step.title: Close The Sale Negotiation
step.description: If the merchandise is currency Crypto, add to information of Sale Negotiation the Crypto address actuality the Broker and later Close the Sale Negotiation
step.name: Customer Broker Sale

step.title: Process Sending Close Negotiation To Customer
step.description: Process Sending Close Negotiation To Customer
step.name: Customer Broker Close

step.title: Sending Close Negotiation To Customer
step.description: Sending Close negotiation to Customer for Close Purchase Negotiation
step.name: Negotiation Transmission

step.title: Receiving Close Negotiation From Broker
step.description: Receiving Close negotiation from Broker for Close Purchase Negotiation
step.name: Negotiation Transmission

step.title: Process Receiving Close Negotiation From Broker
step.description: Process Receiving Close Negotiation From Broker. If the merchandise is currency Crypto, requesting Crypto address actuality the Customer
step.name: Customer Broker Close

step.title: Close The Purchase Negotiation
step.description: If the merchandise is currency Crypto, add to information of Purchase Negotiation the Crypto address actuality the Customer and later Close the Purchase Negotiation
step.name: Customer Broker Purchase

step.title: Sending Confirmation of Close Negotiation

process.name: Open a Purchase Contract

step.title: Start a Customer Broker Purchase Contract creation
step.description: Start a Open Contract Business Transaction.

step.title: Gets the Negotiation ID
step.description: Gets the closed negotiation Id.

step.title: Creates a Open Contract Business Transaction
step.description: Creates a Open Contract Business Transaction with the closed negotiation data.

step.title: Gets the Negotiation clauses
step.description: Gets the Negotiation clauses associated to a closed negotiation.

step.title: Creates a new Contract Record
step.description: Creates a new Contract Record with the Negotiation data.

step.title: Creates a new Customer Broker Purchase Contract

step.title: Update the Contract Status
step.description: Update the Contract status to PENDING_PAYMENT.

step.title: Start a Customer Broker Sale Contract creation

step.title: Creates a Open Contract Business Transaction

step.title: Gets the Negotiation clauses

step.title: Creates a new Contract Record
step.description: Creates a new Contract Record with the Negotiation data.

step.title: Creates a new Customer Broker Sale Contract

step.title: Sends Contract Hash to Crypto Customer
step.description: Sends the contract hash to Crypto Customer.

step.title: Update the Contract Status

process.name: Customer sends an Online Payment
process.description: Customer sends an Online Payment to a Crypto Broker, this payment is associated to a Customer Broker Purchase Contract.

step.title: Customer sends online payment
step.description: Customer select a contract and send payment.
step.name: Crypto Customer

step.title: Process Payment Request
step.description: Process request and starts the payment process.
step.name: Crypto Customer

step.title: Gets the Contract clauses
step.description: Gets the Contract clauses associated to a open contract.
step.name: Customer Broker Purchase

step.title: Creates a Business Transaction
step.description: Creates a Customer Online Payment Business Transaction with the contract data.
step.name: Customer Online Payment

step.title: Sends the Online Payment
step.description: Sends the Online Payment to a Crypto Broker.

step.title: Verifies the Transaction Status
step.description: Verifies the Crypto Status until this is confirmed.
step.name: Outgoing Intra Actor

step.title: Update the Transaction Contract Status
step.description: Update the Transaction Contract status.
step.name: Customer Online Payment

step.title: Sends Payment Notification to Crypto Broker
step.description: Sends the sucessful payment notification to Crypto Broker.
step.name: Transaction Transmission

step.title: Gets the Crypto Broker Confirmation
step.description: Raises an event with the Crypto Broker Confirmation.
step.name: Transaction Transmission

step.title: Update the Contract Status
step.description: Update the Contract status to PAYMENT_SUBMIT.
step.name: Customer Broker Purchase

process.name: Add New Account
process.description: A customer registers a new bank account in the wallet.

step.title: inputs account registration
step.description: inputs account, currency and account type.
step.name: Bank Money

step.title: sends registration request
step.description: sends data to the wallet plugin to registrate the account.
step.name: Bank Money

step.title: registers account
step.description: registers account: account, currency and account type
step.name: Bank Money

process.name: Deposit
process.description: A User Deposits a certain amount on a specific account.

step.title: request deposit transaction
step.description: inputs amount and selects account.
step.name: Bank Money

step.title: sends deposit request
step.description: sends data to the deposit plugin to make the transaction.
step.name: Bank Money

step.title: registers deposit transaction and sends credits to the wallet.
step.description: registers the transaction and send credits on the available and book balance of the account
step.name: Deposit

step.title: register credit on the wallet
step.description: makes credit on the balances of the account.
step.name: Bank Money

process.name: Withdraw
process.description: A User Withdraws a certain amount on a specific account.

step.title: request withdraw transaction
step.description: inputs amount and selects account.
step.name: Bank Money

step.title: sends withdraw request
step.description: sends data to the withdraw plugin to make the transaction.
step.name: Bank Money

step.title: registers withdraw transaction and sends debits to the wallet.
step.description: registers the transaction and validates that the selected account has enough money and send debits to the available and book balance of the account
step.name: Withdraw

step.title: register credit on the wallet
step.description: makes credit on the balances of the account.
step.name: Bank Money

process.name: Balance Inquiry
process.description: returns the current available and book balance of an account.

step.title: balance inquiry
step.description: requests book and available balance of an account
step.name: Bank Money

step.title: sends balance request
step.description: sends balance request to the wallet plugin
step.name: Bank Money

step.title: returns balance of the account
step.description: return balance of the account.
step.name: Bank Money

process.name: Transaction History
process.description: returns the transaction history of an account.

step.title: transaction history request
step.description: requests list of transactions account
step.name: Bank Money

step.title: sends transaction history request
step.description: sends balance request to the wallet plugin
step.name: Bank Money

step.title: returns transaction history
step.description: returns transaction history sorted by date (from most recent to older).
step.name: Bank Money

process.name: Hold
process.description: Holds a certain amount of money in the bank account

step.title: request Hold
step.description: request a hold of the funds in an account

step.title: process hold transaction request
step.description: registers and sends holds funds on the available balance of the account
step.name: Hold

step.title: makes hold
step.description: processes the hold request by making a debit in the account.
step.name: Bank Money

process.name: Unhold
process.description: Unholds funds from an account that were previusly held by the hold transaction

step.title: request unhold
step.description: request an unhold of the funds in an account

step.title: process hold transaction request
step.description: registers, validates that has enough funds held, and sends unhold funds on the available balance of the account
step.name: Unhold

step.title: makes unhhold
step.description: processes the unhold request by summing all the amount of the hold transactions previusly made in the account, then makes the credit.
step.name: Bank Money

process.name: Balance Inquiry
process.description: Returns the current Available and Book balances of the Cash Wallet

step.title: Balance inquiry
step.description: Requests both Book and Available balances of the wallet
step.name: Cash Money

step.title: Sends balance request
step.description: Sends balance request to the Wallet plugin
step.name: Cash Money

step.title: Fetches and returns balances
step.description: Consults database for current balances of the cash wallet
step.name: Cash Money

process.name: Transaction History
process.description: Returns the transaction history (Only deposits and withdrawals) of the cash wallet

step.title: Transaction history inquiry
step.description: Requests list of transactions
step.name: Cash Money

step.title: Sends transaction history request to cash wallet
step.description: Sends balance request to the cash wallet plugin
step.name: Cash Money

step.title: Retches and returns transaction history
step.description: Returns transaction history sorted by date DESC
step.name: Cash Money

process.name: Deposit
process.description: A Fermat user deposits cash money on his Cash Money Reference Wallet

step.title: User requests deposit transaction
step.description: User enters amount and memo
step.name: Cash Money

step.title: Sends deposit request
step.description: Sends deposit data to the deposit plugin to make the transaction
step.name: Cash Money

step.title: Registers deposit transaction and sends credits to the wallet.
step.description: Tries to register a credit on the Available and Book balances of the wallet and, if succeded, registers the transaction internally
step.name: Deposit

step.title: Register credit on the Available and Book balances of the wallet
step.description: Applies a credit on the Available and Book balances of the wallet
step.name: Cash Money

process.name: Withdrawal
process.description: A Fermat user whithdraws cash money from his Cash Money Reference Wallet

step.title: User requests withdrawal transaction
step.description: User enters amount and memo
step.name: Cash Money

step.title: Sends withdrawal request
step.description: Sends withdrawal data to the withdrawal plugin to make the transaction
step.name: Cash Money

step.title: Registers withdrawal transaction and sends debit to the wallet.
step.description: Tries to register a debit on the Available and Book balances of the wallet and, if succeded, registers the transaction internally
step.name: Withdrawal

step.title: Register debit on the Available and Book balances of the wallet
step.description: Applies a debit on the Available and Book balances of the wallet
step.name: Cash Money

process.name: Hold
process.description: Holds (decrements available balance) an amount of cash money from the cash wallet

step.title: External plugin requests a hold of the funds from the cash wallet
step.description: For this, it sends a transaction UUID, an amount, a memo, and its own public key

step.title: Receives hold transaction request
step.description: Registers hold transaction internally as an ACKNOWLEDGED transaction
step.name: Hold

step.title: Internal agent processes hold transaction request
step.description: Tries to hold funds in wallet, if succeded, changes internal status to CONFIRMED, otherwise REJECTED
step.name: Hold

step.title: Tries to hold available funds
step.description: Processes the hold request by making a debit on the available balance of the cash wallet
step.name: Cash Money

process.name: Unhold
process.description: Unholds (increments available balance) an amount of cash money from the cash wallet

step.title: External plugin requests am unhold of the funds from the cash wallet
step.description: For this, it sends a transaction UUID, an amount, a memo, and its own public key

step.title: Receives unhold transaction request
step.description: Registers unhold transaction internally as an ACKNOWLEDGED transaction
step.name: Unhold

step.title: Internal agent processes unhold transaction request
step.description: Tries to unhold funds in wallet, if succeded, changes internal status to CONFIRMED, otherwise REJECTED
step.name: Unhold

step.title: Tries to unhold available funds
step.description: Processes the unhold request by making a debit on the available balance of the cash wallet
step.name: Cash Money

process.name: Payment Request to Intra user
process.description: A Wallet's Intra User sends a payment request to another intra user contact to request payment for a specific amount.

step.title: Select Intra User contact and submit payment request
step.description: The customer selects a contact from the list and submits the payment request.
step.name: Bitcoin Wallet

step.title: Route request to network service
step.description: The module routes this payment request to the Crypto Payment Request Plugin to reach the selected intra user.
step.name: Crypto Wallet

step.title: Route request to network service
step.description: The module routes this payment request to the network service to reach the selected intra user.
step.name: Crypto Payment Request

step.title: Call the intra user to deliver the payment request
step.description: The network service places a call to the intra user and then it delivers the payment request via the Fermat network.
step.name: Crypto Payment Request

step.title: Transport request
step.description: The payment request is transported through the communication layer and one of the available channels.
step.name: Communication Layer

step.title: Receive the payment request
step.description: The network service receives the payment request and informs that to Request Crypto Payment Plugin.
step.name: Crypto Payment Request

step.title: Records the request
step.description: The payment request is saved with the type received and associated to intra user actor .
step.name: Crypto Payment

step.title: Return payment request list
step.description: The module returns the payement request receive list.
step.name: Crypto Wallet

step.title: List Received Payment Request
step.description: The wallet's user go to Payment Request menu and list payment request receive.
step.name: Bitcoin Wallet

process.name: Refuse Payment Request from Intra user
process.description: A Wallet's Intra User refuse a payment request sent by another actor.

step.title: Select payment request record to refuse
step.description: The actor selects a payment request from the list and press deny button.
step.name: Bitcoin Wallet

step.title: Route request to payment request plugin
step.description: The module routes this payment request refuse to the Crypto Payment Request Plugin to reach the selected intra user.
step.name: Crypto Wallet

step.title: Route refuse to network service
step.description: The module routes this refuse to the network service to reach the selected intra user.
step.name: Crypto Payment Request

step.title: Call the intra user to deliver the refuse
step.description: The network service places a call to the intra user and then it delivers the refuse via the Fermat network.
step.name: Crypto Payment Request

step.title: Transport request
step.description: The payment request is transported through the communication layer and one of the available channels.
step.name: Communication Layer

step.title: Receive the payment request
step.description: The network service receives the refuse and informs that to Request Crypto Payment Plugin.
step.name: Crypto Payment Request

step.title: Update the request status
step.description: The payment request is update with the status deny.
step.name: Crypto Payment

step.title: Return payment request send list
step.description: The module returns the payement request send list.
step.name: Crypto Wallet

step.title: List Send Payment Request
step.description: The wallet's user go to Payment Request menu and list payment request send, and show this status.
step.name: Bitcoin Wallet
